reviews.description: I made the honey garlic salmon last night...it was unreal! Quick to make and I was able to use almost only ingredients I already had in my kitchen. Even the kids loved it!
My buddy recommended using a random recipe and cooking it for a date night activity and it was such a fun activity for my partner and I to do together :) 5 stars for sure
Subbed mushrooms for pork in the hot and sour soup to make it vegetarian...surprised by how good it was
